Zhengli Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Ge Pu Village, She Ke Township, Lan County, Luliang City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coking Coal Group Lanxian Zhengli Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coking Coal Group and is a part of their operations in the region.
